description.value: With graceful poise, you perform a dance of dangerous attacks. Stride up to half your speed toward an enemy; if you end this movement adjacent to them make a melee Strike against that foe. If you hit, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Reposition] the target into your square at the same time that you Step into their square. You then make another Strike against the same target, who is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] to the attack. Finally, you can Step away from that enemy.
